name: SENAC Smart Words
description:
DISCLAIMER: This was made exclusively for an education institute in Brazil, where the students would be guided through the game by a teacher (in real life), so some stuff might be out of context for the regular player. It is only available in Brazilian Portuguese.

The player will have to overcome three levels: 

On the first one, the player has to take care of a city by choosing the correct options for different kinds of problems, like sanitation issues, deforestation, abandoned facilities, and so on.

On the second one, the player is in charge of doing recycling, and must sort through the trash properly.

On the third and final level, the player has to control their character through a "runner" type of game, having to read questions and answer properly, based on SENAC's instructions.
